nodes.text: The D-18 pistol was a type of blaster. Various spacers used them during the Galactic Civil War. It was very similar in appearance to the DL-18 Blaster Pistol. A more precise variant was the D-18 Liquidator, which Lieutenant Joth of the Corellian Security Force once offered a spacer as a reward for successfully shutting down the Mummers operations in Coronet City.
